description: Yashio returned to the Tripokalon world as a judge during the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. Reporters were waiting for her at the venue but she did not make a statement. She watched the tournament from a private box but wasn`t impressed with any of the contestants and noted to her secretary that there wouldn`t be another girl like Elle but then she saw Serena crying on a nearby pier with her Pok√©mon.
name: Yashio
